path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Fall 24/Pharmacology/Documents/Module I/FA2024 Pharmacology (VNSG-1331-1001) LEC /Pharmacology Objectives Module 1 Intro.pdf
text: TEMPLE COLLEGE SCHOOL OF VOCATIONAL NURSING VNSG 1331: PHARMACOLOGY Objectives Module 1 Foundations of Clinical Pharmacology Chapters 1, 4 and 5 1. Discuss the general principles of pharmacology 2. Describe the actions of drugs in the human body. 3. Define various drug names, classifications and drug development. 4. Describe government legislation relating to drug development and dispensing, including herbal and dietary supplements, prescription and nonprescription drugs. 5. Use the nursing process to develop a teaching plan. 6. Describe how people learn including ways that promote and deter learning.
